content.query:
union BeyondTrustPM_ActivityAudits_CL, BeyondTrustPM_ClientEvents_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| summarize Count = count() by Type
| extend TableName = case(
    Type == "BeyondTrustPM_ActivityAudits_CL", "Activity Audits",
    Type == "BeyondTrustPM_ClientEvents_CL", "Client Events",
    "Other"
  )
| project TableName, Count
content.title: Event Summary

content.query:
BeyondTrustPM_ActivityAudits_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| summarize Count = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| render timechart
content.title: Activity Audits Over Time

content.query:
BeyondTrustPM_ClientEvents_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| summarize Count = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| render timechart
content.title: Client Events Over Time

content.query:
BeyondTrustPM_ActivityAudits_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| summarize Count = count() by tostring(column_ifexists('ActionType_s', 'Unknown'))
| top 10 by Count desc
| project ActionType = column1, Count
| render barchart
content.title: Top Activity Audit Actions

content.query:
BeyondTrustPM_ClientEvents_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| summarize Count = count() by tostring(column_ifexists('EventType_s', 'Unknown'))
| top 10 by Count desc
| project EventType = column1, Count
| render barchart
content.title: Top Client Event Types

content.query:
BeyondTrustPM_ActivityAudits_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| summarize Count = count() by tostring(column_ifexists('UserName_s', 'Unknown'))
| top 10 by Count desc
| project User = column1, Activities = Count
content.title: Top Users by Activity Audits

content.query:
BeyondTrustPM_ClientEvents_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| summarize Count = count() by tostring(column_ifexists('HostName_s', 'Unknown'))
| top 10 by Count desc
| project Host = column1, Events = Count
content.title: Top Hosts by Client Events

content.query:
BeyondTrustPM_ActivityAudits_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| project TimeGenerated, 
    ActionType = column_ifexists('ActionType_s', ''),
    User = column_ifexists('UserName_s', ''),
    Target = column_ifexists('TargetResource_s', ''),
    Result = column_ifexists('Result_s', '')
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| take 50
content.title: Recent Activity Audits

content.query:
BeyondTrustPM_ClientEvents_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| project TimeGenerated,
    EventType = column_ifexists('EventType_s', ''),
    Host = column_ifexists('HostName_s', ''),
    User = column_ifexists('UserName_s', ''),
    Process = column_ifexists('ProcessName_s', '')
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| take 50
content.title: Recent Client Events
